index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Design, Construction and Land Use; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 2002 Budget of the Department of Design, Construction and Land Use for spending additional grant funds provided by the State of Washington Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development for compliance with the requirements of RCW 36.70A.215; and accepting those additional grant funds made available in 2002; all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
